** 3 養生主第三

而知也无涯。¶	KR5a0090_001:003b:9:10:1,KR5c0126_003:1a:2:1:0
以有涯隨无涯，殆已；¶	KR5c0126_003:1a:3:1:0
已而為知者，殆而已矣。¶	KR3k0046_094:26b:8:4:3,KR5c0126_003:1a:4:1:0
為善无近名，¶	KR1a0113_001:49b:5:7:12,KR5c0126_003:1a:5:1:0
為惡无近刑。¶	KR1a0113_001:49b:5:12:12,KR5c0126_003:1a:6:1:0

文惠君曰：¶「譆，善哉！¶	KR2b0017_072:19a:4:8:8,KR3k0057_058:11a:1:27:153,KR3k0058_122:14b:6:37:3,KR3k0058_125:19b:8:7:3,KR4c0017_002:26a:6:4:62,KR4c0045_021:4a:2:9:10,KR4c0046_021:4a:1:34:7,KR5c0126_003:2a:11:1:2,KR5c0127_004:007b:2:15:37,KR5c0128_004:003a:3:15:4,KR5c0134_001:015a:8:5:25,KR5c0135_004:002b:3:1:6,KR5c0136_003:002a:8:15:3,KR5c0138_002:2a:2:16:2,KR5h0057_001:047b:8:1:50,KR5i0036_002:02p028b:2:5:11,KR6d0098_001:0715c:19:9:523,KR6j0717_001:0359a:3:9:126,KR6s0075_003:0400a:4:14:5
技蓋至此乎？」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_003-3a>¶	KR2c0021_112:63b:1:14:2,KR3k0045_043:7a:6:14:2,KR3k0058_125:19b:8:14:3,KR4c0078_006:21a:8:26:20,KR4d0079_049:1b:8:4:5,KR5c0126_003:2a:13:1:2,KR5c0128_004:003a:4:5:4,KR5c0134_001:015a:8:12:25,KR5c0135_004:002b:3:12:6,KR5c0136_003:002a:9:5:3,KR5c0139_004:004a:9:8:7,KR5h0057_001:047b:8:8:50,KR5i0036_002:02p028b:2:14:11,KR6d0098_001:0715c:19:16:523

官知止

批大郤，¶
導大窾，¶

而刀刃者无厚；¶	KR5c0126_003:2a:37:1:5
以无厚入有間，¶	KR5c0126_003:2a:38:1:5
恢恢乎
其於遊刃必有餘地矣，¶	KR2b0017_072:19b:3:19:8,KR2c0021_112:63b:8:14:2,KR3k0045_043:7b:5:14:2,KR3k0056_167:30a:2:4:3,KR3k0058_122:15a:2:23:3,KR4c0006_002:7a:1:39:5,KR4d0078_022:17b:1:14:40,KR4d0086_013:14a:6:4:31,KR4h0002_006:23a:1:39:4,KR4h0002_059:12a:7:15:5,KR4h0003_005:22b:9:83:8,KR5c0126_003:2a:39:4:5,KR5c0127_004:008a:1:15:37,KR5c0128_004:005b:2:4:4,KR5c0134_001:015b:7:6:26,KR5c0136_003:002b:7:16:4,KR5c0138_002:2b:6:9:2,KR5c0139_004:008a:5:4:11,KR5h0057_001:048a:7:5:50,KR6d0098_001:0715c:23:3:523,KR6e0012_020:0155c:19:1:41,KR6e0021_002:0121b:8:8:268,KR6j0717_001:0361c:8:5:156,KR6s0075_003:0400b:10:9:5

# dating: 8110
是以十九年而刀刃若新發於硎。¶	KR2b0017_072:19b:4:7:8,KR2c0021_112:64a:1:2:2,KR3k0012_346:4a:7:18:8,KR3k0012_999:4a:7:18:10511,KR3k0045_043:7b:6:2:2,KR3k0058_122:15a:2:32:3,KR4h0106_038:27b:8:2:19,KR5c0126_003:2a:40:1:6,KR5c0127_004:008a:2:7:37,KR5c0134_001:015b:7:15:26,KR5c0135_004:003b:4:13:7,KR5c0136_003:002b:8:8:4,KR5c0138_002:2b:6:18:2,KR5c0139_004:008b:1:1:12,KR5h0057_001:048a:7:14:50,KR5i0036_002:02p029a:2:12:11,KR6j0717_001:0361c:8:14:156,KR6m0045_002:0296a:6:9:9,KR6q0079_005:0275c:19:16:50,KR6s0075_003:0400b:10:18:5
雖然，每至於族，¶	KR1a0056_019:25a:8:2:1,KR2b0017_072:19b:4:20:8,KR2c0021_112:64a:1:15:2,KR3a0047_067:15b:7:18:4,KR3k0045_043:7b:6:15:2,KR4h0050_001:29a:6:13:6,KR4h0106_038:27b:8:15:19,KR5c0126_003:2a:41:1:6,KR5c0127_004:008a:3:3:37,KR5c0127_004:009b:2:1:37,KR5c0128_004:006a:1:1:4,KR5c0134_001:015b:8:11:26,KR5c0135_004:003b:5:9:7,KR5c0136_003:002b:9:4:4,KR5c0138_002:2b:7:10:2,KR5c0139_004:008b:3:1:12,KR5h0057_001:048a:8:10:50,KR5i0036_002:02p029a:3:24:11,KR6s0075_003:0400b:13:32:5

視為止，¶
行為遲。¶

「然。」¶
「然則弔焉若此，可乎？」¶	KR1d0051_058:26a:8:5:8,KR2c0021_083:41a:6:12:1,KR3k0012_561:6a:1:2:6,KR3k0012_999:6a:1:2:12552,KR3k0058_107:5a:2:9:2,KR4c0006_003:85b:6:38:62,KR5c0105_001:019a:3:1:5,KR5c0126_003:2a:77:1:10,KR5c0127_005:001a:5:6:2,KR5c0128_004:008b:8:6:4,KR5c0134_001:016b:1:6:29,KR5c0135_004:005a:8:8:8,KR5c0136_003:004a:9:6:5,KR5c0138_002:3b:8:5:2,KR5c0139_004:013b:3:1:17,KR5h0057_001:050b:8:6:53,KR5i0036_002:02p030a:1:20:11,KR6s0075_003:0402b:9:5:11

始也吾以為其人也，¶	KR1d0051_058:26a:8:15:8,KR2c0021_083:41a:7:1:1,KR3k0012_561:6a:1:12:6,KR3k0012_999:6a:1:12:12552,KR3k0058_107:5a:2:19:2,KR5c0126_003:2a:80:1:11,KR5c0138_002:3b:8:28:2,KR6s0075_003:0402b:10:12:11

古者謂是帝之縣解。」¶	KR2c0021_083:41b:3:11:1,KR4c0020_025:45a:6:18:37,KR4c0022_003:4a:7:4:3,KR5c0105_001:019a:9:9:5,KR5c0126_003:2a:95:1:12,KR5c0127_005:001b:1:8:2,KR5c0127_005:002b:10:10:2,KR5c0127_005:004a:6:12:2,KR5c0127_090:001b:4:12:2,KR5c0134_001:016b:7:8:29,KR5c0135_004:006a:8:7:9,KR5c0136_003:005a:3:12:6,KR5c0138_002:4a:8:32:2,KR5c0139_004:016a:1:1:19,KR5h0057_001:051a:4:8:53,KR5i0036_002:02p030a:8:39:11,KR6q0219_001:0032a:12:5:197,KR6q0221_030:0771c:19:8:6,KR6s0075_003:0403a:6:24:11
